Text: What is the file extension for this? I can't get it to open.

If you have a file extension, just rename rzr-daoa to rzr-daoa.7zip and extract.

Donc try with winrar cause it'll ask you rzr-daoa.r00 after 1 or 2 secs.

Was my only issue, did that and now, it works perfectly, thanks a lot for this torrent !
